item.description: BasicGame About This is the most basic example of a game in PinGod and should be used as a starting point for the majority of games. Multiplayer 1-4 players 3 Balls Per Game Ball Trough (4 Balls) Manual Plunger Auto Plunger Multiball (4 ball) Ball Saves High Scores Attract Mode BasicGame - Visual Pinball: Download This download contains the exported and built BasicGame.
